name: Reborn - Episode 1: New Life
description:
An orphaned young man from a poor foster family miraculously gets into the continent's most prestigious college. He has to leave his friends behind and venture into a new world. Love, friendship, sex, drugs, rocknroll, intrigue, conspiracies and humor are just some of the moments you will encounter.



Reborn is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel (VN).
The plot centers on a young man who finds himself in a world alien to him. A world of status and prestige. The choices you make determine future events and also shape your character. A brash and reckless bully? Or a sweet and caring guy? It depends only on you.
Girls in the game also have their own character and certain views. Their attitude to you depends on your choice. To be faithful and build a relationship with the girl of your dreams or to give yourself over to student life and let it consume you? After all, being a student is only a short period of life, right?



The visual novel isn't limited to text-based storytelling. The game has interactivity in the form of mini-games, location exploration. Finding photo cards that unlock extra lewd illustrations.



Reborn - Episode 1: New Life includes 4 acts.
Act 1: Alien is currently available.
It contains:
  • Over 2,000 high quality renders.
  • 48 animations.
  • Several hours of exciting gameplay.
  • A wide selection of tracks.
  • Replayability.
